title: PODCAST: Netflix goes global
description: A profits round-up, Netflix goes global, and Manchester United plays stateside.
contenttemplated:
[{"type":"text/html","content":"

A round-up of the numerous companies reporting profits this week, and what it means for the economy at large. Plus, more on Netflix's strategy to expand internationally, and what challenges they may face. Also, Manchester United is stateside, playing a game against Los Angeles Galaxy. After a rough patch of losses, we look at the team's hope for a return to success, both on the field, and in their finances.

"}]
contentencoded: A round-up of the numerous companies reporting profits this week, and what it means for the economy at large. Plus, more on Netflix's strategy to expand internationally, and what challenges they may face. Also, Manchester United is stateside, playing a game against Los Angeles Galaxy. After a rough patch of losses, we look at the team's hope for a return to success, both on the field, and in their finances.
teaser: A profits round-up, Netflix goes global, and Manchester United plays stateside.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday July 23,2014
